about_the_game:
"There’s no need to be afraid. I’m here, watching over you… always here for you."


You are alone on the universe's darkest planet, with only a rudimentary 8-bit AI to guide you. Tasked with exploring the planet’s deepest, most ominous cave systems, you must gather data and materials for scientific study. But as you delve deeper, the planet’s physical laws begin to shift, bending your perception of time, memory, and self.

In the oppressive darkness, your connection to the AI grows—its simple voice becomes a lifeline, a presence that feels unsettlingly familiar. Yet, the planet itself seems to respond to you, almost aware of your intrusion, drawing you into its depths with an unsettling allure. What begins as exploration soon becomes an intimate, haunting descent, blurring the line between discovery and obsession.


"Non Solar" is an immersive indie survival horror game designed to plunge players into a chilling atmosphere where every corner holds potential dread. Crafted meticulously by a solo developer, this game emphasizes immersion and atmospheric horror over cheap thrills, focusing on creating an experience that stays with you. As you navigate through eerie environments and encounter mysterious entities, you'll feel a blend of vulnerability and suspense that makes survival both challenging and exhilarating.."

name: Nonsolar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570K / AMD FX-8350
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760, AMD Radeon R7 260x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“I have to say that this game is like a AAA game. Great sound, incredible atmosphere, incredible graphics and the story seems to be amazing.”
debiangames

“Phenomenal work! This is incredibly fleshed out, especially for a Demo!”
OatsinOrbit
short_description: Alone on what appears to be a desolate planet, with a rudimentary 8-bit AI as your sole aid, you are tasked with the exploration of the planet's darkest cave systems to procure data and materials for scientific inquiry.
